title: Sporadic ping since last live update
body: I'm on a wired cable connection and have ALWAYS gotten a steady connection of 35-38 ping. At most it will spike to 40. Since the last live maintenance, I've had a floor of 42 with it going anywhere from there to 500 ping at any point and time. There's no steady rate. It's just a constant fluctuation of anywhere between 42-500 ping. I restarted my connection, computer, client, checked bandwidth usage, and tested my connections to other games' servers (all normal). This has prompted me to seek further help/answers. Anyone else dealing with this and/or does Riot know about this issue?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having network issues like packet loss, which could be happening for a variety of reasons.  Since it's sudden, I'm thinking packet loss but we can find out for sure through running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  This should provide some solid results on what's going wrong, as well as a series of troubleshooting steps to fix this up.  Let me know what you find!
